/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with red lanterns that add a splash of color to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, guiding the viewer's eye through the image. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a sense of movement and life to the image. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
